features: Made in Jordan with dead sea minerals
Triple Milled Rejuvenating Bar with Dead Sea Salts & Shea Butter
Natural, thoughtfully designed fragrances and textures
Unique combination of salts and over twenty minerals
Lasts weeks and weeks in the shower
body.description: Triple milled rejuvenating bar with Dead Sea salts and shea butter. One With Nature Soaps combine genuine Dead Sea minerals - thousands of years in the making - with a pure vegetable base and moisturizing shea butter to provide a truly luxurious cleansing experience. Our soothing bath bars relax muscles, stimulate circulation and restore the skin's natural pH. Best of all, they are 100% natural. Experience the Dead Sea Difference. Designed thoughtfully, developed naturally, manufactured responsibly. No animal testing. Made in Jordan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Only Soap I Use
reviews.reviewText: This dead sea mineral soap is the only soap I've used that doesn't break me out. All other brand names I tried broke me out or made my skin irritated. This soap not only cleanses me properly but my wife love the smell of my body after taking showers. It more price efficient also to buy the 6 pack it comes in to save a little money.Pros:Doesn't break my skin out in hives.No irritation at all after usage.One bar lasts a long time. Much longer than brand name soaps like Dove.Creates a great lather on large face towels.Cons:Much more expensive than brand name soaps in retail stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Soap, Convenient Multi-pack
reviews.reviewText: I first found this in the natural products section of a local supermarket, but they stopped carrying it - I'm so glad I can find it on Amazon! This soap is very mild on my sensitive skin, lathers nicely even in hard water, and has a neutral scent. The bar lasts longer than South Of France bars. All natural, not tested on animals and no animal ingredients. The multi-pack is a good price, imo, and convenient to keep my closet stocked. Will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely high-quality soap and perfect for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: After using One With Nature Dead Sea Salt soap, I can't go back to normal Dove bar soap. We've been using it for over two years.It's all natural and extremely gentle. Great for sensitive, eczema-prone skin -- scent-free, but still makes you feel fresh and clean. Doesn't dry out skin. Lathers well, especially with a loofah.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2010
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great soap, good for my skin, great price
reviews.reviewText: I have acne prone skin that can also be very dry. This soap is gentle but cleanses my skin well and seems to help balance it out. It is a tad drying on the face, but no more than other products I have used (in fact less than most), and I use a moisturiser anyway. It does not smell as strong as other sulphur soaps. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: He loves it! Says his skin is soft and good quality! He is happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Please don't make Dead sea dry out.
reviews.reviewText: Same as everyone else who gave five stars. It delivers. Very good for Atopic Dermatitis, Sebhoric Dermatitis, very very dry skin . Just touch your face after washing with this soap, you know what we are talking here. I feel sad Dead sea is drying and our future generations will not have access to these natural ailments. Yes , your skin is directly related to climate changes and universe is a cycle. Nothing can be created or destroyed, it takes different form, that's it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nature Dead Sea Mineral Soap, Dead Sea Salt bars PACK 0f 6
reviews.reviewText: SCENT FREE is NO scent - wonderful for us that are sensitive to scent or smells.WONDERFUL - a friend gave me a bar and I loved it so much I ordered a SIX PACK of bars!Bars last an extra long time!Lathers wells so you feel extra clean after shower or bath*** An added bonus for me is those aches and pains seem to have disappeared and I pray for the same experience for you.I also ORDERED a bar soap pouch that keeps the bar soap and will keep all the soap scraps so that every piece is used completely (nothing wasted).Look for "Body Benefits Lathering Soap Pouch 4 PACK (Turn any soap into a soap on a rope)."

I dont know how much salt they use but i do like how big the bars are amd the presentation its really professional. I would give it a 5 star but i havent tried enought different soaps that are the same from different brands to really know thats why i gave it a 4
